name: Linked (itch) (CrimsonPixel)
description:
Welcome to Linked

This is my first game jam submission. Linked is an infinite vertical scroller. There are 2 characters on the screen, one on the left and one on the right. You are responsible for controlling the player on the left, the player on the right will mimic the movement of the left player. On the left side all the enemies and obstacles will spawn which can damage you, on the right all coins spawn which you can collect. You have to carefully move the player in such a way that you collect coins and avoid enemies.

Controls:

  1.  "A" and "D" to move left or right.
  2. "Space" to jump or double jump.
  3. "Left Mouse Button" to shoot.
  4. "Esc" to pause the game.

Assets used:

  1. Brackeys  2d mega  pack.
  2. Warped Caves
